svg.style: background: transparent; background-color: transparent; color-scheme: light dark;
svg.content:
<mxfile host="app.diagrams.net" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/142.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/142.0.0.0" version="29.2.1"> <diagram name="第 1 页" id="PScylSmoT09gK2YTM_wo"> <mxGraphModel dx="1772" dy="974" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="827" pageHeight="1169" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="style_container" parent="1" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#f5f5f5;strokeColor=#666666;fontStyle=1;verticalAlign=top;spacingTop=5;arcSize=5;" value="" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="style_component" parent="1" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#dae8fc;strokeColor=#6c8ebf;fontStyle=0;verticalAlign=middle;" value="" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="style_db" parent="1" style="shape=cylinder3;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;boundedLbl=1;backgroundOutline=1;size=15;fillColor=#ffe6cc;strokeColor=#d79b00;" value="" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Client_Group" parent="1" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#E1F5FE;strokeColor=#0277BD;fontStyle=1;verticalAlign=top;spacingTop=5;arcSize=5;" value="Client Layer (VFS)" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="180" width="300" x="30" y="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="App_SDK" parent="Client_Group" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#B3E5FC;strokeColor=#0288D1;" value="User Application / SDK" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="40" width="260" x="20" y="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="VFS_Core" parent="Client_Group" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#ffffff;strokeColor=#0288D1;fontStyle=1" value="" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="80" width="260" x="20" y="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="VolMgr_Client" parent="VFS_Core" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#fff2cc;strokeColor=#d6b656;fontSize=11;" value="VolumeManager
(Client Side)" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="35" width="110" x="10" y="22.5" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Access_Tracker" parent="VFS_Core" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#f8cecc;strokeColor=#b85450;fontSize=11;" value="AccessTracker
(Hot/Cold Logic)" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="35" width="120" x="130" y="22.5" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="MDS_Group" parent="1" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#F5F5F5;strokeColor=#666666;fontStyle=1;verticalAlign=top;spacingTop=5;arcSize=5;" value="MDS Metadata Cluster (Control Plane)" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="260" width="480" x="420" y="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="MdsServer" parent="MDS_Group" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#D5E8D4;strokeColor=#82B366;fontStyle=1;fontSize=14;" value="MdsServer Service" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="40" width="440" x="20" y="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="MetaMgr_Group" connectable="0" parent="MDS_Group" style="group" value="Metadata Manager" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="150" width="200" x="20" y="90" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="MetaMgr_Box" parent="MetaMgr_Group" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#ffffff;strokeColor=#82B366;dashed=1;" value="" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="150" width="200" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="InodeStore" parent="MetaMgr_Group" style="shape=cylinder3;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;boundedLbl=1;backgroundOutline=1;size=10;fillColor=#e1d5e7;strokeColor=#9673a6;fontSize=11;" value="InodeStorage
(inodes.bin)" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="60" width="90" x="10" y="10" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="BitmapStore" parent="MetaMgr_Group" style="shape=cylinder3;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;boundedLbl=1;backgroundOutline=1;size=10;fillColor=#e1d5e7;strokeColor=#9673a6;fontSize=11;" value="BitmapStore
(alloc bitset)" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="60" width="90" x="10" y="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="DirStore" parent="MetaMgr_Group" style="shape=note;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;backgroundOutline=1;darkOpacity=0.05;fillColor=#fff2cc;strokeColor=#d6b656;size=15;fontSize=11;" value="DirStore
(Log-Struct)" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="60" width="80" x="110" y="10" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="KVStore" parent="MetaMgr_Group" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#f8cecc;strokeColor=#b85450;fontSize=11;" value="KVStore
(Path->Inode)" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="50" width="80" x="110" y="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ResMgr_Group" connectable="0" parent="MDS_Group" style="group" value="Resource Allocator" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="150" width="220" x="240" y="90" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ResMgr_Box" parent="ResMgr_Group" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#ffffff;strokeColor=#666666;dashed=1;" value="" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="150" width="220" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="VolAlloc" parent="ResMgr_Group" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#dae8fc;strokeColor=#6c8ebf;fontStyle=1;" value="VolumeAllocator" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="40" width="200" x="10" y="15" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="VolReg" parent="ResMgr_Group" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#dae8fc;strokeColor=#6c8ebf;" value="VolumeRegistry" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="30" width="200" x="10" y="65" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ColdColl" parent="ResMgr_Group" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#d5e8d4;strokeColor=#82b366;fontStyle=2;fontSize=11;" value="ColdDataCollector
(Policy Engine)" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="35" width="200" x="10" y="105" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="SSD_Node_Group" parent="1" style="swimlane;childLayout=stackLayout;resizeParent=1;resizeParentMax=0;startSize=20;horizontal=1;horizontalStack=0;html=1;fillColor=#ffe6cc;strokeColor=#d79b00;fontColor=#000000;rounded=1;" value="Hot Tier: StorageNode (SSD)" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="120" width="240" x="40" y="360" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="SSD_Dev_1" parent="SSD_Node_Group" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#ffffff;strokeColor=#d79b00;align=left;spacingLeft=10;" value="SSD Device 1 (NVMe)" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="30" width="240" y="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="SSD_Dev_2" parent="SSD_Node_Group" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#ffffff;strokeColor=#d79b00;align=left;spacingLeft=10;" value="SSD Device 2 (NVMe)" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="30" width="240" y="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="SSD_Vol" parent="SSD_Node_Group" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#ffcc99;strokeColor=#d79b00;fontStyle=1;" value="Volume Instance (Active)" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="40" width="240" y="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="HDD_Node_Group" parent="1" style="swimlane;childLayout=stackLayout;resizeParent=1;resizeParentMax=0;startSize=20;horizontal=1;horizontalStack=0;html=1;fillColor=#dae8fc;strokeColor=#6c8ebf;fontColor=#000000;rounded=1;" value="Warm Tier: StorageNode (HDD)" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="120" width="240" x="320" y="360" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="HDD_Dev_1" parent="HDD_Node_Group" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#ffffff;strokeColor=#6c8ebf;align=left;spacingLeft=10;" value="HDD Device 1 (SATA)" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="30" width="240" y="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="HDD_Dev_2" parent="HDD_Node_Group" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#ffffff;strokeColor=#6c8ebf;align=left;spacingLeft=10;" value="HDD Device 2 (SATA)" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="30" width="240" y="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="HDD_Vol" parent="HDD_Node_Group" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#b3e5fc;strokeColor=#6c8ebf;fontStyle=1;" value="Volume Instance (Active)" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="40" width="240" y="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Opt_Lib_Group" parent="1" style="swimlane;childLayout=stackLayout;resizeParent=1;resizeParentMax=0;startSize=20;horizontal=1;horizontalStack=0;html=1;fillColor=#e1d5e7;strokeColor=#9673a6;fontColor=#000000;rounded=1;" value="Cold Tier: Optical Library" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="140" width="260" x="600" y="360" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Opt_Robot" parent="Opt_Lib_Group" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#ffffff;strokeColor=#9673a6;" value="Robotic Arm / Drives" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="30" width="260" y="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Opt_Discs" parent="Opt_Lib_Group" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#d4e1f5;strokeColor=#9673a6;align=left;spacingLeft=10;verticalAlign=top;" value="Disc Pool (20,000 slots)" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="60" width="260" y="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Opt_Mgr" parent="Opt_Lib_Group" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#e1d5e7;strokeColor=#9673a6;fontStyle=1;" value="DiscManager" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="30" width="260" y="110" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Monitor_Group" parent="1" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#fff2cc;strokeColor=#d6b656;fontStyle=1;verticalAlign=top;spacingTop=5;arcSize=5;" value="Monitoring" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="460" width="160" x="960" y="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Prometheus" parent="Monitor_Group" style="shape=cylinder3;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;boundedLbl=1;backgroundOutline=1;size=15;fillColor=#ffcc99;strokeColor=#d79b00;" value="Prometheus
(Scraper)" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="80" width="100" x="30" y="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Grafana" parent="Monitor_Group" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#ff9933;strokeColor=#d79b00;fontStyle=1;fontSize=14;" value="Grafana
(Dashboard)" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="60" width="120" x="20" y="160" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Exporter" parent="Monitor_Group" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#ffffff;strokeColor=#d6b656;dashed=1;" value="MetricsExporter
(Port 9100)" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="40" width="120" x="20" y="320" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="link_c_mds" edge="1" parent="1" source="VFS_Core" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;exitX=1;exitY=0.5;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;strokeWidth=2;edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;" target="MdsServer" value="RPC: Create/Lookup"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="link_c_ssd" edge="1" parent="1" source="VFS_Core" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;strokeWidth=3;fillColor=#d5e8d4;strokeColor=#82b366;" target="SSD_Node_Group" value="Data IO (Read/Write)"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="170" y="300" /> <mxPoint x="160" y="300" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="link_c_hdd" edge="1" parent="1" source="VFS_Core" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;strokeWidth=2;fillColor=#d5e8d4;strokeColor=#82b366;" target="HDD_Node_Group" value=""> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="170" y="300" /> <mxPoint x="440" y="300" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="link_mds_alloc" edge="1" parent="1" source="ResMgr_Group" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;dashed=1;exitX=0.25;exitY=1;entryX=0.75;entryY=0;" target="SSD_Node_Group" value="Placement/Balance"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="link_mds_archive" edge="1" parent="1" source="ResMgr_Group" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;dashed=1;exitX=0.75;exitY=1;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;" target="Opt_Lib_Group" value="Archive Policy"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="link_mon_mds" edge="1" parent="1" source="Exporter" style="endArrow=classic;startArrow=oval;html=1;dashed=1;entryX=1;entryY=0.5;exitX=0;exitY=0.5;strokeColor=#FF9900;" target="MDS_Group" value="Scrape"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="930" y="340" /> <mxPoint x="930" y="170" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>
